Heya everybody I'm trying to rework an old project of mine and figured I might as well add some music here and there (in gamebook).  

I want there to be a toggle to turn music on or off so I don't think the action tab of the pages will work, didn't get it to work anyway. I managed to make a decent enough toggle but upon advancing to the next page the music stops, any way to keep it playing?
